channel.title: [GLITCH] Missing Texture in UC Vent O' Carnage [Fixed]
channel.description:
In the scene where one scientist is trying to pull another from a vent in Unforseen Consequences, I found myself determined to get a look at what ate him. I grabbed a couple of barrels and stacked them up, only to find a missing texture/noclip texture down at the end of the vent.
P.S: Loving it so far.
[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20578437/BM_UC_Glitch%20Pics/bm_c1a1c0000.jpg[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20578437/BM_UC_Glitch%20Pics/bm_c1a1c0001.jpg[/img]
map:bm_c1a1c0001
getpos: setpos -630.947998 -2344.031250 -923.968750;setang 18.420933 151.828262 0.000000
